00015 //! The root node of KAME
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #ifndef measureH
00018 #define measureH
00019

00021 #include <xnodeconnector.h>

00023 class XThermometerList;
00024 class XDriverList;

00036 /*! The root node of KAME.
00037  */
00038 class XMeasure : public XNode
00039 {
00040     XNODE_OBJECT
00041 protected:
00042     XMeasure(const char *name, bool runtime);
00043 public:
00044     virtual ~XMeasure();
00045 
00046     //! call me before loading a measurement file.
00047     void initialize();
00048     //! clean all drivers, thermometers.
00049     void terminate();
00050     //! stop all drivers.
00051     void stop();
00052 
00053     const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometerList() const {return m_thermometers;}
00054     const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &driverList() const {return m_drivers;}
00055     const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaceList() const {return m_interfaces;} 
00056     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarEntryList() const {return m_scalarEntries;}
00057     const shared_ptr<XGraphList> &graphList() const {return m_graphList;}
00058     const shared_ptr<XChartList> &chartList() const {return m_chartList;}
00059     const shared_ptr<XTextWriter> &textWriter() const {return m_textWriter;}
00060     const shared_ptr<XRawStreamRecorder> &rawStreamRecorder() const {return m_rawStreamRecorder;}
00061     const shared_ptr<XRawStreamRecordReader> &rawStreamRecordReader() const {return m_rawStreamRecordReader;}
00062 
00063     const shared_ptr<XRuby> &ruby() const {return m_ruby;}
00064 private:
00065     shared_ptr<XRuby> m_ruby;
00066 
00067     const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> m_thermometers;
00068     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> m_scalarEntries;
00069     const shared_ptr<XGraphList> m_graphList;
00070     const shared_ptr<XChartList> m_chartList;
00071     const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> m_interfaces;
00072     const shared_ptr<XDriverList> m_drivers;
00073     const shared_ptr<XTextWriter> m_textWriter;
00074     const shared_ptr<XRawStreamRecorder> m_rawStreamRecorder;
00075     const shared_ptr<XRawStreamRecordReader> m_rawStreamRecordReader;
00076 
00077     const xqcon_ptr m_conRecordReader,
00078     m_conDrivers, m_conInterfaces, m_conEntries, m_conGraphs,
00079     m_conTextWrite, m_conTextURL, m_conTextLastLine,
00080     m_conBinURL, m_conBinWrite, m_conUrlRubyThread,
00081     m_conCalTable, m_conNodeBrowser;
00082     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnReleaseDriver;
00083     void onReleaseDriver(const shared_ptr<XNode> &driver);
00084 };
